channel.title: applied research day on apiercey.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in applied research day on apiercey.github.io

item.title: Runner-Up of Standalone Project - Applied Research Day 13.0
item.author: alexander.piercey@gmail.com (Alexander Butt-Piercey)
item.description: It was my pleaseure to be apart of Runner-Up team accepting the Award of Excellence for Applied Research Day 12.1 for a Stand-Alone Project. Shout-out to MicroMetrics for the wonderful support and opportunity and my team mates on the extrodinary work put forward. An article about the event from the Office of Applied Research can be found here: https://www.algonquincollege.com/arie/2015/04/applied-research-day-13-0/

item.title: Third Place - Applied Research Day 12.2
item.author: alexander.piercey@gmail.com (Alexander Butt-Piercey)
item.description: After a long-day of competition, the MicroMetrics Applied Research team accepted Third-Place for the Award of Excellence. Thanks for the fun and hard work. An article about the event from the Office of Applied Research can be found here: https://www.algonquincollege.com/arie/2014/12/applied-research-day-12-2/

item.title: Winners of Applied Research Day 12.1
item.author: alexander.piercey@gmail.com (Alexander Butt-Piercey)
item.description: It was my pleaseure to be apart of the First Place team accepting the Award of Excellence for Applied Research Day 12.1 Shout-out to MicroMetrics for the wonderful support and opportunity and my team mates on the extrodinary work put forward. An article about the event from the Office of Applied Research can be found here: https://www.algonquincollege.com/news/2014/08/22/winners-of-applied-research-day-12-1/
